Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute at at California/26th
ShortDescription: 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, 26th, Kedzie, 31st and California: near California/26th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, 26th, Kedzie, 31st and California: due to, police activity near California/26th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Service Delayed near Garfield
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are standing near Garfield due to due to fire department activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are standing near Garfield due to due to fire department activity. 

Shuttle buses have been requested from 63rd/Ashland and 63rd/Cottage to 35th-Bronzeville-IITto  provide connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
